snippet: Though Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s popularity has dipped, in the last six months, he has received roughly $5 million in contributions.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo has received around $5 million in campaign contributions so far in 2015, despite his consistently dropping approval ratings.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and THOMAS KAPLAN

lead_paragraph: Though Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s popularity has dipped, in the last six months, he has received roughly $5 million in contributions.

headline.main: Governor Cuomo’s Fund-Raising Is Not Affected by His Low Favorability Rating
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Popularity Hits a Low Among Voters, but Prominent Donors Are Still Lining Up
